title: Object Oriented Programming Repository
body: Features Evolution Simulator and 2048 game project written in Java with use of maven, lombok and JavaFX.

title: Evolution Simulator
body: Project made as a part of Java labs, in free time developed as a way of polishing skills as well as learning Spring library

title: Course wiki
body: Webpage and system for signing up for courses using Angular & Firebase.

title: Conway's Game of Life
body: Project made  as a recruitment task showcasing designing, programming and documenting a project in Java.

title: IT Webpage
body: Webpage for tech company, featuring bootstrap for Introduction to Web Application laboratories.

title: Cooking Webpage
body: Webpage for cooking recipes, with simple javascript and basic html and css for Introduction to Web Application laboratories.
